qas.question: What might wood be used for in a building made from brick or other materials?
What crucial part of a house is often constructed from wood?
Wood might be used to construct what exterior component of a building?
Inside a building, what wooden things might you open to enter or leave rooms?

context: In buildings made of other materials, wood will still be found as a <a0_0>supporting material<a0_0/>, especially in <a1_0>roof<a1_0/> construction, in interior <a3_0>doors<a3_0/> and their frames, and as exterior <a2_0>cladding<a2_0/>.
